question: Battle of Buxar was fought between which of the following powers?
option1: British vs combined force of Mir Jafar and Miran
option2: British vs combined force of  Siraj-Ud-Daulah and Alivardi Khan
option3: British vs combined force of Mir Kashim, Nawab Vazir and Shuja-ud-Daula
answer: British vs combined force of Mir Kashim, Nawab Vazir and Shuja-ud-Daula
explanation: Battle of Buxar was fought in the year 1764. It was fought between the British vs combined force of Mir Kashim, Nawab Vazir and Shuja-Ud-Daula.
